entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -22.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 41 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -32.4°C
Wind: WNW 27 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
